website_summaries.verdict: An affordable accessory set that includes the most popular Instant Pot accessories.
pros: Includes a steamer basket, springform pan, steamer egg rack, egg bites mold, bowl clip, oven mitts, and scrub pad
Springform pan is nonstick to make it easy to use and clean
Increases the number of ways you can use your Instant Pot for a lower price than many other sets
cons: The oven mitts still allow some heat through

customer_reviews.title: What an awesome set!
customer_reviews.text: Everything fit perfectly!! I made a cheesecake in the springform pan in 20 minutes. Cooked 2 dozen eggs by stacking them in the pan and rack in 5 minutes. Mini omelets were awesome in the muffin pan. Cant wait to try mini meatloaves in the muffin pan. Would definitely reccomend to anyone who has an instapot!
customer_reviews.author: debbielinton

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for so many quality products!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far I've used this to hard cook eggs and bake a cheesecake! The hot pads are very handy and the scrubbers work great! Looking forward to trying to make some mini individual egg bites tomorrow in the silicone mold... Considering buying another set to keep as a backup!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kenyon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set for the instant pot
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect set to go with an instant pot, it would be a great gift for an instant pot user or to go with one. Everything fits perfectly in my instant pot ultra. Love the egg stand and the steamer basket. The little gloves are perfect for pulling out hard boiled eggs. The spring form pan is perfect for making cheesecake. Love using the silicon mold for making egg bites and pancake bites.
customer_reviews.author: Valfreya

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Loving this set! Everything first perfectly in my IP. The scrubbers work well, and we’ve used the mits for the toaster oven too! I wouldn’t recommend using the plate grabber with a heavy plate. Our dish set is pretty heavy, but it works fine for our children’s plates (much lighter). The only complaint t I have is the steam basket sitting on the bottom/not leaving room for water to bring the pot to pressure, but this can be remidied by either placing it on top of the egg tray, or putting a bit of tin foil underneath. Overal, it’s a great set!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Biebel

customer_reviews.title: Great products just missing instructions
customer_reviews.text: I received the order very fast. The accessories are great and good quality. They are working great with my instant pot so far! The egg mold is my favorite and Can be used o For cooking in the instant pot, or to make freezer molds. My only negative thing of why I did not give 5 stars is there were no instructions with them. I had to go back to my order to look at the pictures to see what some of the items were for.
customer_reviews.author: sweetpeajenni

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for app instant pot owners
customer_reviews.text: This set is a great starting point for any instant pot owner. The silicone molds are perfect for egg bites, mini muffins, and freezing extra broth in 2oz portions. The springform pan was great perfect for cheese cake. The steamer basket is good but I wish it was a little taller. Overall this set is well worth the money. Only thing I didn't like was the silicone scrubbing brushes. Probably just my preference tho. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: ks_47

customer_reviews.title: Love egg bites? Cheesecake?! This is the set for you.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great all in one product for people who use their IP often. The green silacone mold makes PERFECT egg bites, just like the pricey ones from everyone's favorite coffee shop. The springform pan makes incredible cheesecake in a flash. The steamer basket can keep your veggies and proteins seperate while still cooking them both. Honestly the entire set is amazing, a really reasonable price, and super easy to clean. Highly reccomended.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Schey

customer_reviews.title: I use every piece!
customer_reviews.text: I believe this set is one of those must haves for your IP. I have lost count on how many times I have used each item. I use my IP so much that my stove is feeling the neglect! The set came right on time and everything is well made. I was very impressed with the springform pan as well. No leakage at all from the bottom and perfect for making NY cheesecakes in my IP.
customer_reviews.author: Jae H.

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory set
customer_reviews.text: I've used everything in this package except the egg bite molds (I don't like eggs this way so I'll have to figure out what else to use it for). I'm happy with the quality and the functionality of the items. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this to friends or family.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect accessory set for an Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: I love this accessory set! I have 2 6 qt Instant pots and this perfect! The springform pan is the perfect size and is super easy to clean. The silicone eggbite form is equally as awesome, perfect for egg, pancake or brownie bites. I have yet to use the steamer pan but it's a great size.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Eggs taste great
customer_reviews.text: Like everyone else has said, this is great to make eggs with. I haven't tried a cheesecake but I'm really excited to tackle that next! It's easy to use and to clean which is really important.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Really everything I needed at the right price. So far it all works how it should. The egg bite mold is a bit difficult to clean but it may be bc the bites stuck in the inside since I must not have greased adequately.
customer_reviews.author: ezdoesit

customer_reviews.title: Skip this set
customer_reviews.text: Mainly bought this for the silicone mold and the spring pan. The spring pan is trash, it doesn’t stay on and keeps popping off from the base which made it frustrating the first time I attempted cheesecake on this thing. Poor quality on this item, everything else seems good.
customer_reviews.author: K.alva

customer_reviews.title: Great products!
customer_reviews.text: Very high-quality products. I have used and love each one. They're all very sturdy and the silicone is fantastic. These are not cheaply made like most others. I highly recommend them. For sure better than I thought they would be.
customer_reviews.author: Amber A.

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing! I love making homemade cheesecake in my spring form pan, and my eggs cook so we'll in the egg cooker. Oh, and the silicone scrubbers work great!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Lowder

customer_reviews.title: Needed
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these items. I had been wanting an egg bite mold but for a few more dollars I got so much more. Everything fits perfectly and well made.
customer_reviews.author: MarrytheGarey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and maintain
customer_reviews.text: Already used these pieces on my insta pot. Great for beginners, easy to clean and lots of recipes come with the package
customer_reviews.author: JaniBanis06

customer_reviews.title: Must have items for Instant Pot users.
customer_reviews.text: This comes with a lot of things that I use with my Instant Pot. No need to buy lot of different ones to get everything that’s comes with this. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: 3musketeers

customer_reviews.title: Nice Instanpot products
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used most of these products. But they are all well made and looks just like the pictures. Glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Like this starter accessory group for the instant pot. Didn't know I would need the hot pads and I use them the most.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Koski

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Love the value for everything I recieived. Used the steamer basket last night to steam small potatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. FIsak

customer_reviews.title: Additional resources that add more options for cooking in the Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: The 9 piece Instant Pot Accessories is very nice and adds to the various things you can make in the Instant Pot. I need to find more recipes so I can use all the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: sandberg

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with my 6qt instant pot. Use all of these all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna C

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Great accessories set for the instant pot. Many helpful tools and tricks to help make great meals!
customer_reviews.author: dubplateprincess

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a bargain price
customer_reviews.text: Really great accessories kit to get you started on branching out in new instant pot recipes. So far I used it to make a cheesecake and some deviled eggs. Can’t wait to try more new recipes
customer_reviews.author: Foxy Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Great for everything you use your instant pot for!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set I use it pretty much daily!
customer_reviews.author: Shiann Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Items just as described
customer_reviews.text: Everything just as described. The egg bites mold is the 'larger' size - it fits the 6qt Instant Pot just right (I've heard some egg bite molds are smaller). Shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: K Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Cake pan leaks :(
customer_reviews.text: My cake pan leaks batter out of it :( I wanted to like it but it keeps leaking
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: This came extremely fast. It has everything you need for your instant pot. We love it! I recommend it to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Emily Moore

customer_reviews.title: Know your right size before ordering it. I amount going to reorder the smaller size
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the wrong size it's to big to fit inside my pot. I didn't return it because I hate returns.
customer_reviews.author: stanley e evert

customer_reviews.title: Love the kit
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the kit. Easy to clean and use. Price was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Winston

customer_reviews.title: 9 piece instant pot set
customer_reviews.text: Great for boiling eggs and making a small cakes. Feel like it should have instructions for what each item is and can be used for.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Johnson

customer_reviews.title: size
customer_reviews.text: everything is so small for my 8 qt it's suppose to be for 6-8,qt,but more like for a 3 qt spring form pan is so small it would make enough for 1 person
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: The first time I’ve used a little set of tongs to lift the basket out of my instant pot they broke. What a joke. Wondering what will fall apart next.
customer_reviews.author: David Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set for the instant pot
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this set! The egg bites mold gets used the most at our house, everyone loves them. I love having a steamer basket and springform pan that fit in my 6qt Instant pot, I couldn't find any small enough in the local stores. My kids think the silicone mitts are adorable and often use them for puppets as well. The scrubbles come in handy, I was thinking about getting some and was glad to see them in the set! So far I've only used the egg rack to hold the steamer basket, but it's nice that it's higher than the trivet that comes with the instant pot.
customer_reviews.author: Christina W

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, multi-use set!
customer_reviews.text: This set can be used for so many things! I love being able to make a cheese cake in my instant pot. It made it perfectly for Thanksgiving! The grips are wonderful for getting the pan out of the instant pot. The egg steamer rack fixes a flaw in the original rack. Making boiled eggs is so much easier! I don't have to worry about my eggs breaking. I also love the steamer basket. Being able to more easily steam in the instant pot is wonderful! This should be bought when you buy your instant pot or shortly after as it has pieces that fix issues with the instant pots original design.
customer_reviews.author: VWorlow

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but high quality set
customer_reviews.text: I made my first instant pot cheesecake with the springform pan that comes with this kit. Turned out beautifully. The silicone egg molds came in handy for ice pops for my son (every time a new silicone product like this comes in the house he makes ice pops). So far I have been pleased with all the pieces that I have used. The price is inexpensive but the quality is really great. I have a few more things planned to use the rest of the pieces soon.
customer_reviews.author: C. North

customer_reviews.title: Good starter pack for Instant Potters
customer_reviews.text: The silicone mold is great for the sous vide egg bites (starbucks inspired) that everyone raves about. We use the strainer basket for steamed veggies. The springform pan is of course used for delicious cheesecake (white chocolate Reese's was our most recent!). Bundles help save some money so I usually try to keep a list of which accessories I want and buy as they go on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Jeenyus

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I loved receiving my package and quickly made lasagna with the mold on the same day. Now, a few days later, I used the same mold to cook some chicken in some sauce and it's falling apart. Contacted vender about peeling issue and the fact that I didn't receive cookbook and no response.
customer_reviews.author: Ivettemom

customer_reviews.title: Great, except for scrubbers.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the springform pan yet, but I have enjoyed using the other products. Great quality. The only disappointment is that the two pan scrubbers do not work well at all. Way too soft, and they don't remove the food from the inner pot.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy T.

customer_reviews.title: Not a durable springform pan
customer_reviews.text: Have used the springform pan twice since I purchased in March, and hand washed. The non stick coating is already peeling off in huge chunks now rendering the item unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t repurchase.
customer_reviews.text: Spring pan rusted upon first wash. Eggs stuck to the silicone egg cups.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne H.

customer_reviews.title: All that you need
customer_reviews.text: Perfect grouping of utensils. Makes cooking in the instapot much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: All items in this bundle are high quality. I am excited to use the spring form pan and the egg rack. I've been really needing accessories to open up new instant pot possibilities, these will make it possible. Highly reccomend!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Got this to make Sous Vide egg bites and Its awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Useful accessories for Instapot but a little pricey for what you get.
customer_reviews.text: Useful accessories for Instapot but a little pricey for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Sharkman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great set. High quality and fit together neatly. I’m excited to use them.
customer_reviews.author: freelywehavereceived

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter set
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a basic, simple batch of tools for starting with my Instapot. This met the need perfectly, at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Sassygramma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my instant pot. Makes it easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: anna marie hardin

product_meta.title: 9 Piece Accessories Kits Compatible with Instant Pot 6, 8 Qt - Standard Stainless Steel Steamer Basket, Non-Stick Springform Pan, Egg Rack, Egg Bites Mold, Oven Mitts, Bowl Clip and Silicone Scrub Pad
feature_bullets: 【FULL COMPLETE ACCESSOIES KIT 】These 9 piece instant pot accessories kit contains all our consumer needs when it comes to making meals for family and friends ‘needs. They include 1 stainless Steel Steamer Basket, 1 Non-stick Springform Pan, 1 Steamer Egg Rack, 1 Silicon Egg Bites Mold, 1 Bowl Clip, 2 Silicon Oven Milts and 2 Silicone Scrub Pad.(The Instant Pot Cooking Time Table will be sent out by email when your item was delivered.If you have not received the email,please contact us.)

【OFFERS HEALTHIER COOKING METHODS】 Our steamer basket offers one of the best cooking methods with a 90% nutrient remain compared to fried food or grilled food. It can cook a variety of foods ranging from seafood, fish, vegetables, eggs, meat and baby food among others. Most favorable in reheating food without loss of the original nutrients or flavor as compared to microwave.
【HIGH QUALITY】The standard steamer basket is made of food grade 304 stainless steel.Maintains its shiny appearance over time and easier to clean.
【IDEAL KITCHEN GADGET】Food-grade silicone scrub pad is soft and bendable enough to clean irregular kitchen ware. Lightweight, easy to clean and carry, dishwasher safe and dry faster!

【A VARIETY OF COOKING TOOLS】The egg steamer rack holds the eggs securely so you don’t have to worry about them rolling out and breaking.For instance, you can use this rack stand and a springform pan to cook cheesecake in the Instant Pot. The Silicon Egg Bites Mold can be used for pudding, cupcakes, sauces, can be used as child snack tray. The non-stick spring form pan The latching side panel detaches easily for quick and safe removal of your delicate cheesecake or streusel coffee cake.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars259 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
